module.title: Task
module.shortDescription: Create a self-validating Task for a Smart Contract interaction.
module.longDescription: Create a Task centered around a Smart Contract Engagement. We will seamlessly authenticate the interaction with the specified function or entire smart contract(s) to greenlight the submission. You may name this Task in a user-friendly manner, so your community members can engage with it without needing in-depth knowledge of whatâ€™s happening behind the hood.
